scripts.build:moodle: npm run build && npm run copy:moodle
scripts.copy:moodle: npm run copy:moodle:windows || npm run copy:moodle:unix
scripts.copy:moodle:unix: rm -rf public/eljwplayer/react-app && mkdir -p public/eljwplayer/react-app && cp -r dist-moodle/* public/eljwplayer/react-app/
scripts.deploy:moodle: npm run build:moodle && echo 'Ready for Moodle deployment. See DEPLOYMENT.md for next steps.'
scripts.test:integration: echo 'See TESTING.md for integration test scenarios'
